Class InternshipApplication

java.lang.Object
entity.InternshipApplication
public class InternshipApplication extends Object
Represents a student's application to an internship, managing the complete application lifecycle.

This aggregate entity handles the state transitions of an internship application from submission through decision, acceptance, and potential withdrawal. It enforces domain rules regarding student eligibility, application caps, and internship availability.

Key Lifecycle States:

  • PENDING - Application submitted, awaiting company decision
  • SUCCESSFUL - Company offered the position to student
  • UNSUCCESSFUL - Company rejected the application
  • WITHDRAWN - Student or system withdrew the application

Domain Validations:

  • Internship must be open for applications
  • Student must be eligible for internship level
  • Student must not have existing confirmed placement
  • Student must be under application cap

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipApplication

      public InternshipApplication(LocalDate appliedOn, Student student, Internship internship, Student.AppReadPort appReadPort)
      Creates a new internship application with the specified application date.

      Performs comprehensive domain validation including:

      • Internship availability and visibility
      • Student eligibility for internship level
      • Student application cap limits
      • Existing confirmed placements
      Parameters:
      appliedOn - the date when the application was submitted
      student - the student submitting the application
      internship - the internship being applied to
      appReadPort - the read port used to check existing applications and placements
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any required parameter is null
      IllegalStateException - if any domain validation rule is violated

    • InternshipApplication

      public InternshipApplication(Student student, Internship internship, Student.AppReadPort appReadPort)
      Creates a new internship application dated with the current date.
      Parameters:
      student - the student submitting the application
      internship - the internship being applied to
      appReadPort - the read port used to check existing applications and placements
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any required parameter is null
      IllegalStateException - if any domain validation rule is violated

  • Method Details

    • getApplicationId

      public String getApplicationId()
      Returns the unique application identifier.
      Returns:
      the application ID in format "APP####"

    • getAppliedOn

      public LocalDate getAppliedOn()
      Returns the date when the application was submitted.
      Returns:
      the application date

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent()
      Returns the student who submitted this application.
      Returns:
      the student entity

    • getInternshipId

      public String getInternshipId()
      Returns the internship ID associated with this application. This provides a durable link even when the internship object is not attached.
      Returns:
      the internship ID, or null if not available

    • getInternship

      public Internship getInternship()
      Returns the attached internship object. Note: This may be null if not yet re-attached after loading from persistence.
      Returns:
      the internship entity, or null if not attached

    • getStatus

      public ApplicationStatus getStatus()
      Returns the current application status.
      Returns:
      the application status

    • isStudentAccepted

      public boolean isStudentAccepted()
      Checks if the student has confirmed acceptance of this offer.
      Returns:
      true if student has accepted the offer, false otherwise

    • canAccept

      public boolean canAccept()
      Checks if this application can be accepted by the student. An application can be accepted when it's SUCCESSFUL and not already accepted.
      Returns:
      true if the student can accept this offer, false otherwise

    • isActiveTowardCap

      public boolean isActiveTowardCap()
      Checks if this application counts toward the student's active application cap. Applications count toward the cap when they are PENDING or SUCCESSFUL but not yet accepted.
      Returns:
      true if this application counts toward the cap, false otherwise

    • markSuccessful

      public void markSuccessful()
      Marks the application as SUCCESSFUL (offer made to student). Only PENDING applications can be marked as successful.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the application is not in PENDING status

    • markUnsuccessful

      public void markUnsuccessful()
      Marks the application as UNSUCCESSFUL (rejected by company). Only PENDING applications can be marked as unsuccessful. Cannot reject after student has accepted the offer.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the application is not in PENDING status or student has accepted

    • markWithdrawn

      public void markWithdrawn()
      Marks the application as WITHDRAWN. This can be called by the student or as part of an approved withdrawal request.

    • confirmAcceptance

      public void confirmAcceptance(Student.AppReadPort appReadPort)
      Confirms student acceptance of the internship offer. Reserves a slot in the internship and marks the application as accepted.
      Parameters:
      appReadPort - the read port used to validate student placement status
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if application cannot be accepted, student has existing placement, or internship details are not attached

    • revokeAcceptanceAfterApprovedWithdrawal

      public void revokeAcceptanceAfterApprovedWithdrawal()
      Revokes a previously confirmed acceptance after an approved withdrawal. Releases the reserved slot in the internship.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no acceptance to revoke or internship details not attached

    • setApplicationId

      public void setApplicationId(String applicationId)
      Sets the application ID (used by repository when loading persisted data).
      Parameters:
      applicationId - the external application ID

    • setInternshipId

      public void setInternshipId(String internshipId)
      Sets the internship ID (used when loading from persistence before re-attaching the object).
      Parameters:
      internshipId - the internship ID string

    • setInternship

      public void setInternship(Internship internship)
      Re-attaches the Internship object after repository loading. This method synchronizes the internship ID with the attached object.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship instance to attach (or null to detach)
